Find how many coins the advisor would receive in that month?

options.d: इसमें समझ स्तर के शिक्षण पर अधिक बल दिया जाता है

options_eng.a: The main emphasis is placed on the presentation of the subject matter.
options_eng.b: This approach is based on the cumulative theory of learning.
options_eng.c: Herbert's lesson plan is called the mother of lesson planning.
